column6:
The Gamma Corps want the Hulk dead-- but why? Find out this issue as we explore the individual origins of Corp members Prodigy, Mess, Mr Gabriel and Griffin! Shocking revelations will be made-including the surprising connection one of them has to a former Hulk side kick and how another is actually an ex-member of the Hulk's Rogue's Gallery! Plus, General Ryker fires his first salvo and officially enters WWH!,2007,8

32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Sandu Florea | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller (cover):Staz Johnson | colorist:Wil Quintana | writer:Frank Tieri
